Actions.Text: REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION
REFERRED TO NEW YORK CITY EDUCATION

Title: Creates a city-wide council for district seventy-five
Summary: Creates a city-wide council for district seventy-five to advise and comment on educational or instructional policies involving district seventy-five services.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to creating a city-wide council for district seventy-five
